field.name: isDebit
field.description: Y if account class is a Debit class, otherwise a Credit; determined automatically by class and saved here

field.name: isTemporary
field.description: Y if account is a temporary (income statement) account, determined automatically by class and saved here

field.name: externalId
field.description: ID of the account in an external system where the accounts are imported/exported

entity.description: A grouping of GlAccount records for purposes of reporting and populating forms such as tax forms. It is structured so that each GlAccount can be a member of at most one group of each type.
Used to specify relevant GL Accounts for an Enumeration (expense, revenue, etc); not related to posting conf
Found by assetId, then by assetTypeEnumId and classEnumId, then by just assetTypeEnumId

field.name: assetGlAccountId
wipAssetGlAccountId
field.description: The debit account for the asset value (purchase cost) on issue to production run (inventory consumed). The credit account on receive from production run (inventory produced). The opposing account will be the assetGlAccountId.

field.name: receiptGlAccountId
field.description: The credit account on receipt (Unreceived Inventory, Unreceived Asset, etc)

field.name: issuanceGlAccountId
accDepreciationGlAccountId
field.description: The credit account for the depreciation expense for Fixed Assets (paired with depreciationGlAccountId); A debit account for Fixed Asset sale or write off

field.name: depreciationGlAccountId
field.description: The debit account for the depreciation expense for Fixed Assets (paired with accDepreciationGlAccountId)

field.name: profitGlAccountId
lossGlAccountId
field.description: The debit account for the loss derived from the disposal of the asset

field.name: shrinkageGlAccountId
field.description: The debit account for the loss (or cost) for inventory shrinkage or lost fixed assets

field.name: foundGlAccountId
field.description: The credit account for the gain from inventory or fixed assets found

field.name: isPayable
field.description: If Y is Payable, N is Receivable.

field.name: glAccountId
field.description: If not specified uses the GlAccountTypeDefault setting for GatAccountsReceivable or GatAccountsPayable

field.name: direction
field.description: If I for Incoming (Purchase) Invoices and if O for Outgoing (Sales) Invoices. If E is for either.

field.name: isPayable
field.description: If Y is Payable, N is Receivable, E for either.

field.name: isPayable
field.description: If Y is Payable, N is Receivable.

field.name: isApplied
field.description: If Y is for Applied Payment, N for Unapplied Payment, E for either.

field.name: realTimeGlSummary
field.description: Defaults to N. If set to Y GlAccountOrganization and GlAccountOrgTimePeriod are updated with each AcctgTrans post.

field.name: errorGlJournalId
field.description: Journal to which all the failed automatic transaction are assigned. If the error journal is set, if the GL posting fails for some reason the triggering operation (finalizing an invoice or payment or whatever) would NOT roll back, instead the partial GL post would be placed into the error journal.

field.name: settlementTermId
field.description: The default SettlementTerm to use on receivable (outgoing) invoices if there is none from agreement, order, etc

moqui.basic.Enumeration.description: USA - Individual, Sole Proprietor, Single-member LLC
Standard (faster, may have gaps, per system)
Enforced and Restart on Fiscal Year (no gaps, per org, reset to 1 each year)
Standard (faster, may have gaps, per system)

field.name: debitCreditFlag
field.description: If D is a debit, if C is a credit.

field.name: isSummary
field.description: Set to Y if this is a summary entry from a sub-ledger.
